s: April 24, 2025 - Founded in June 2011, THQ Nordic is an Austrian video game publisher based in Vienna that acts as the primary publishing arm of Swedish holding company Embracer Group. THQ Nordic GmbH, originally Nordic Games GmbH, changed its name to THQ Nordic in 2016 to better reflect its games portfolio.
